channel.title: "Use Bank Booth" not working?

item.title: "Use Bank Booth" not working?
item.dc:creator: @Maizez Maizez
item.description:
@Maizez wrote:

Hi everyone,

I searched around for a while and am still stuck.
I’m back to 317 programming. More like back to Java programming in general… So please just go easy on me
It’s a very very clean DeltaScape source by Tatemo.

Resolved!!!

I had to add this block of code under the Packet for Object First Click which was case 132:

if ((objectID == 2213)) { skillX = objectX; skillY = objectY; WanneBank = 1; }

Read full topic
